item.title: EP 567 - The Missing Children Of Happy Valley
item.itunes:title: The Missing Children Of Happy Valley
item.description:
Today we visit the most dangerous workplace on Earth, and then we visit Happy Valley . . .at least we would if it still existed!

 

Patreon 

https://www.patreon.com/user?u=18482113

 

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Links:

Recycling plant admits culpability for gruesome fatal accident

https://nypost.com/2020/11/13/british-recycling-plant-admits-culpability-for-fatal-accident/

Father Crushed to Death Inside Recycling Compactor After Co-Worker Accidentally Switches it On

https://toofab.com/2020/11/13/father-crushed-to-death-inside-recycling-compactor-after-co-worker-accidentally-switches-it-on/

Man crushed inside recycling compacter when colleague accidentally switched it on

https://metro.co.uk/2020/11/13/man-crushed-by-recycling-compacter-when-colleague-turned-it-on-13589590/?ito=cbshare

Happy Valley WMA

https://www.hauntedplaces.org/item/happy-valley-wma/

Looking back at Happy Valley, a farm town uprooted in the 1930s to make way for wildlife

https://www.newyorkupstate.com/northern-ny/2016/04/rediscovering_happy_valley_ny.html

Happy Valley Wildlife Management Area

https://www.dec.ny.gov/outdoor/68691.html

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

------------------------------------------------

Logo Art By Ash Black

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Music By Dr. Huxxxtable

Rabbitron 3000 created by Eerbud

Thanks to Chris K, Founder Of The Golden Rabbit Brigade

Dead Rabbit Archivist Some Weirdo On Twitter AKA Jack

 

http://www.DeadRabbit.com

Twitter: @DeadRabbitRadio

Facebook: www.Facebook.com/DeadRabbitRadio

 

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.

All Contents Of This Podcast Copyright Jason Carpenter 2018 - 2020
